name.baseName: Electricity production ; Electricity ; Thermal power (92.3%) + hydropower (1.8%) + wind power (1.6%) + solar power (4.3%)

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Forms of electricity generation include thermal power, hydropower, wind power and solar power
电力产生形式包括火力发电、水力发电、风力发电和太阳能发电

time.common:timeRepresentativenessDescription: Calculated based on data from the 2019 Energy Statistics Yearbook
根据2019年能源统计年鉴数据计算

technology.technologicalApplicability: This dataset represents the application of electricity production through various generation methods including thermal power, hydropower, wind power, and solar power. The mix of these generation methods reflects the proportions used in the reference year and is indicative of a power grid that relies predominantly on thermal power generation. The information is relevant for modeling energy systems and assessing the environmental impact of electricity consumption within regions that share a similar energy production profile.
此数据集代表通过包括火力发电、水力发电、风力发电和太阳能发电等多种方式进行电力生产的应用。这些发电方式的混合体现了参考年份中的使用比例，并指示了主要依赖热力发电的电力网。该信息与模拟能源系统和评估在具有类似能源生产概况的地区内的电力消费环境影响相关。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataTreatmentAndExtrapolationsPrinciples: For the accounting method, please refer to the "Enterprise Greenhouse Gas Emissions Accounting Methods and Reporting Guidelines for Power Generation Facilities". Different forms of power generation and fuel consumption come from Chapter 3 (Energy Production) and Chapter 6 (Regional Energy Balance Sheet) in the "China Energy Statistical Yearbook 2020". The fuel parameters such as low calorific value and carbon content per unit calorific value used to calculate the carbon dioxide emission factor come from the "2019 China Regional Power Grid Carbon Dioxide Baseline Emission Factor Calculation Instructions OM" and the "Enterprise Greenhouse Gas Emission Accounting Method and Reporting Guide for Power Generation Facilities" 》
核算方法参考《企业温室气体排放核算方法与报告指南 发电设施》。不同形式发电量及燃料用量来自于《中国能源统计年鉴 2020》中的第三章（能源生产） 和第六章（地区能源平衡表）。用于计算二氧化碳排放因子的低位发热量、单位热值含碳量等燃料参数来自于《2019 年度中国区域电网二氧化碳基准线排放因子 OM 计算说明》、《企业温室气体排放核算方法与报告指南 发电设施》

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 熊若熙. 中国电力生产和消费二氧化碳与污染物排放因子核算. (清华大学, 2023).
熊若熙. 中国电力生产和消费二氧化碳与污染物排放因子核算. (清华大学, 2023).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When using this data set for Life Cycle Assessment (LCA) or other environmental impact modeling, ensure to account for the specific energy mix provided, as it significantly affects the results due to varying emission factors among different generation technologies. This data set is calculated based on the 2019 Energy Statistics Yearbook, and for the accounting method, it refers to greenhouse gas reporting guidelines specific to power generation facilities. Make sure to update the data to reflect changes in the energy mix over time or to match the energy profile of the specific region of interest. Caution should be taken to use the correct emission factors for thermal, hydro, wind, and solar power that are consistent with the methodological guidance provided.
在使用此数据集进行生命周期评估（LCA）或其他环境影响建模时，确保考虑所提供的特定能源混合，因为不同发电技术之间的不同排放因子会显著影响结果。该数据集是根据2019年能源统计年鉴计算的，并且核算方法参考了针对发电设施的温室气体报告指南。确保更新数据以反映能源混合随时间的变化或匹配特定关注区域的能源概况。应注意使用与所提供的方法论指导一致的热电、水电、风电和太阳能的正确排放因子。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
